name: Football Super Free kick: A Flick Soccer game
name_original: Football Super Free kick: A Flick Soccer game
description:
The best football free kick game of 2017 is out on iOS, Become a real football star, scoring spectacular goals - make your perfect strike. Improve your free kick skill with this reality based free kick soccer game.

Get trained by shooting targets to get the bonus points and extra time, the best score is always a challenge for the next game. Beat your friends and make the highest score in three amazing gameplay modes.

Download Now Football Super Free kick - the most realistic football simulator for penalty kicks shootout.

Impressive achievements, share replays, uncover new modes time attack, target and random mode. Get ready and play the best game for fans of penalty kicks.

- Super realistic FREEKICKER
- Simple and very easy operation
- Frequent updates
- High-level optimization
- Smooth 3D controls
- Realistic sound effects
